name: rpc-nats-alvamind
description: A flexible RPC library using NATS

scripts.clean: rm -rf .bun .turbo .eslintcache .parcel-cache node_modules .next .cache dist build coverage .eslintcache .parcel-cache .turbo .vite yarn.lock package-lock.json bun.lockb pnpm-lock.yaml .DS_Store && echo 'Done.'
scripts.build:lib: bun install && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./build --target node && bun pm pack
scripts.build: bun run build:type && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./build --target node

author: Alvamind
